elementSpec.desc: contains a single well-formed XML example demonstrating the use of some XML element or attribute.

remarks.p: The element's contents should be marked as belonging to the namespace http://www.tei-c.org/ns/Examples if they are to be validated against the TEI scheme; if the content is well-formed XML from some other namespace, it must be enclosed in a CDATA marked section. If the content is not well-formed XML, the more general eg element should be used in preference.
